definition: Straits Exchange Foundation (SEF)/abbr. to 海基會|海基会[Hai3 ji1 hui4]
pinyin: Hai3 xia2 Jiao1 liu2 Ji1 jin1 hui4

sentences.english: Deputy Mayor He Jihua meets with principal members of Kagoshima Cultural Exchange Group.
sentences.chinese: 市長何寄華會見鹿兒島文化藝術交流團的主要成員。

sentences.english: Today, however, the moon will embrace Uranus, the wild-card planet of the zodiac, in your third house of communication.
sentences.chinese: 然而今天，月亮和天王星處在你的第三宮交流宮。

sentences.english: Eye contact is sometimes the key to communication.
sentences.chinese: 目光接觸是交流中的一個重要環節。

sentences.english: Documenting and defending these decisions depends on the communication skills discussed below.
sentences.chinese: 證明和維護這些決策依賴於下面討論的交流技能。

sentences.english: Next year has been designated as the Year of China-Pakistan Friendship. A number of exchange activities will be held.
sentences.chinese: 明年是“中巴友好年”，雙方將舉辦一系列交流活動。

sentences.english: During his speech he pointed out the 3 root reasons for why Chinese are not good at communication.
sentences.chinese: 吳建民指出，“中國人不大會交流”有三個根本原因。

sentences.english: First, context is very important to understanding intercultural communication.
sentences.chinese: 首先，瞭解背景情況對不同文化之間的交流非常重要。

sentences.english: Ji maintained that "Cultural exchange is the main drive for humankind`s progress.
sentences.chinese: 季羨林認爲，“文化交流是人類進步的主要動力之一。

sentences.english: It reduces communication to the level of the press release.
sentences.chinese: 它把我們的交流降低到發佈發佈狀態的水平上。

sentences.english: Employment interview is the process of transferring information between interviewers and interviewees.
sentences.chinese: 面試是面試官與應聘者進行面對面交流的過程。

sentences.english: Member of China Korea Japan culture exchange association.
sentences.chinese: 中國名人文化藝術交流中心常務理事。

sentences.english: Use them respectfully in both oral and written communication.
sentences.chinese: 充滿敬意地在口頭和書面交流中使用它們。

sentences.english: Every aspect for intercourse of physical education for both side's could open more.
sentences.chinese: 兩岸體育交流的點線面，可以更加開放。

sentences.english: Available either single or double solenoid, AC or DC operated with aluminum bodies.
sentences.chinese: 可無論是單或雙線圈，交流或直流操作與鋁體。

sentences.english: This paper emphasizes Hatching Knowledge's function as tools in the knowledge interflow .
sentences.chinese: 本文強調了孵化知識在知識交流中的工具性作用。

sentences.english: Third, see the exchanges between China and abroad from the tributes and the grant goods.
sentences.chinese: 三是從通貢雙方的貢賜物品看當時的中外交流情況。

definition: to join/to connect/to link up/to communicate
connection/contact/relation/to get in touch with/to integrate/to link/to touch
